name: Poochyena
description: At first sight, POOCHYENA takes a bite at anything that moves. This POKéMON chases after prey until the victim becomes exhausted. However, it may turn tail if the prey strikes back.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.effect: This Pokémon is always successful fleeing from wild battles, even if trapped by a move or ability.

abilities.name: Quick Feet
abilities.effect: Whenever this Pokémon has a major status ailment, it has 1.5× its Speed.  This Pokémon is not affected by the usual Speed cut from paralysis.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is halved.
abilities.description: Boosts Speed if there is a status problem.

abilities.name: Rattled
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's Speed rises one stage with each hit from a damaging dark-, ghost-, or bug-type move.
abilities.description: Some move types scare it and boost its Speed.
